name: Cucumber Ensalada
description: Indulge in a refreshing and health-conscious Cucumber Ensalada, perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This simple yet delightful recipe bridges the gap to a healthier lifestyle with its use of coconut amino and coconut vinegar with honey, making it an essential addition to your healthy recipes collection.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the cucumber into thin rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the coconut amino and coconut vinegar with honey, stirring until well mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced cucumber to the bowl and gently toss to coat evenly with the dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Let the Cucumber Ensalada marinate for 10 minutes to absorb the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled or at room temperature.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
